line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Returns a random ship depending on the game's difficulty and whether a spawned ship is a Renegade roamer or defender.
* Each ship category contains 2 elite ships, 4-5 better ships, and 4-7 standard-grade ships.
* Defenders are renegade ships assigned to the renegade station. Roamers are renegade ships spawned throughout the galaxy.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Normal and hard difficulty increased - 10% chance to spawn an M6 and 5% chance to spawn an M7 respectively.
* On easy and normal, roamers are M3s. On hard, roamers are M6.

* On easy, defenders use the same classes as roamers. On normal, 10% chance for a defender to be an M6 instead of an M3. On hard and insane, 5% and 10% chance respectively for a defender to be an M7 instead of an M6.
* For renegades created by the renegade station, it's important to homebase this new renegade at the renegade station, so we have a means to track how many have been created.
* As we start to send out invasion swarms, some of these ships can be removed from the station ownership and sent to seek out a player sector.
* when that happens, the station task here will just build more to replace them.
* = [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Gen.ColourShipName' : String=$name Colour=1 OnlySearchLastThreeForDigits=[FALSE] OnlyReturnString=[FALSE] Ship=$ship
* Only M7 and up from Renegade station have hangars.
* On hard difficulty, there is a 10% chance for the ship to have pandora tuning.
* On insane, 40% chance for the ship to have pandora tuning.

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Returns a random ship depending on the game's difficulty and whether a spawned ship is a Renegade roamer or defender.
Each ship category contains 2 elite ships, 4-5 better ships, and 4-7 standard-grade ships.
Defenders are renegade ships assigned to the renegade station. Roamers are renegade ships spawned throughout the galaxy.
Add-Ons 1.2: Normal and hard difficulty increased - 10% chance to spawn an M6 and 5% chance to spawn an M7 respectively.
On easy and normal, roamers are M3s. On hard, roamers are M6.

On easy, defenders use the same classes as roamers. On normal, 10% chance for a defender to be an M6 instead of an M3. On hard and insane, 5% and 10% chance respectively for a defender to be an M7 instead of an M6.
For renegades created by the renegade station, it's important to homebase this new renegade at the renegade station, so we have a means to track how many have been created.
As we start to send out invasion swarms, some of these ships can be removed from the station ownership and sent to seek out a player sector.
when that happens, the station task here will just build more to replace them.
= [THIS]-> call script 'Lib.Gen.ColourShipName' : String=$name Colour=1 OnlySearchLastThreeForDigits=[FALSE] OnlyReturnString=[FALSE] Ship=$ship
Only M7 and up from Renegade station have hangars.
On hard difficulty, there is a 10% chance for the ship to have pandora tuning.
On insane, 40% chance for the ship to have pandora tuning.
